title: Best of The Herd for Mar 04, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 04, 2020
description:
Colin tries to make sense of the rumors of a Brady/Jimmy G swap

The Clippers are boring but are the best team in the league and will win the title

LeBron James is the better MVP story than Giannis and still won't win the award

3 things that will absolutely happen in the NFL draft including one team that will trade up for a top QB

Guest: Nick Wright, Co-Host of FS1's First Things First & Peter Schrager, FOX Sports NFL Reporter




Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
